comment.description: Free text comments about the campaign

email-embedded-link.description: The malicious URL in the e-mail body.

email-sender.description: The source address from which the e-mail was sent.

email-sender-ip.description: The source IP from which the e-mail was sent.

email-subject.description: The subject line of the e-mail.

mitm-connect-back-ip.description: IP from where the TA attempts to log in

mitm-connect-back-useragent.description: User-agent used by the TA for log in attempts

phishing-domain.description: Domain where the phishing stages are hosted

phishing-ip.description: IP address where the phishing stages are hosted

phishing-url.description: URLs of the various phishing stages

description: Spearphishing template to describe a campaign from the email to the TA connect back IOC
name: spearphishing-campaign
